title: HOLY FUCKING LAG
body:
Riot, you know, maybe you guys can earn a lot more money if you made some attempts to keep up with the rest of the century's technology to not drive away so many customers, my windows vista is more powerful than...whatever you call this piece of scrap metal shit as your server.

***FOR FUCKS SAKE TURN ON LOSS PREVENTED WHILE YOU REVIVE JIMMY THE HAMSTER!!!!!***

Incoming Servers get shut down again, it is the new years, nothing says Toaster Games like servers crashing and everyone being booted out of the log in queue again.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_yYzsdBzzho
